solution_line_template: Their novel is half as long as their {history_book_pages}-page history book so it is {history_book_pages}/{half_divisor} = <<{history_book_pages}/{half_divisor}={novel_pages}>>{novel_pages} pages

Their science book has {science_book_multiplier} times the amount of pages as their novel, which is {novel_pages} pages, so their science book has {science_book_multiplier}*{novel_pages} = <<{science_book_multiplier}*{novel_pages}={science_book_pages}>>{science_book_pages} pages
